message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiations at a price of $150. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $150 and $120. How about we try $135?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $135. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about we try $125?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to give you a slight discount from $135 to $130. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $128 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to give you a slight discount from $130 to $129. What do you think?
I appreciate your continued willingness to adjust the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $127 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to give you a slight discount from $129 to $128.5. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more adjustment, but I'm really close to my budget. I'm willing to pay $126.5 for the product. This is my final offer. Can you meet me at that price?
